newsitem.title: USA: Symix acquires Canadian software firm.
newsitem.headline: Symix acquires Canadian software firm.

text.p: Symix Systems Inc Friday said it acquired Canadian-based Visual Applications Software Inc for an undisclosed sum.
FieldPro is the signature software product of Visual Applications, which will remain as a business unit under Symix, the company said.
FieldPro allows companies to track their service business, and provide data needed to evaluate profitability of products and service organizations.
Symix said it will market FieldPro to mid-sized companies and divisions of multinational corporations, and deliver a Symix-branded product using the same technology for manufacturers.
Ohio-based Symix develops and markets business management software systems for manufacturers.
